value:
$WmMPID_双界ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|You're doing well, Nah. Keep it up!
Say whatever it is you want.$k$p$nMPID_ンン|Uhh... Oh, I know! I want to win
the festival tournament!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|Understood. Then let's win the
tournament, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭セレナ,ch04_25_Serena_F_SpringFes21,Face|Get your heads in the game this
time, you two! No excuses!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Of course. I will not have a repeat
of the shameful performance we just
put on. I can't have it end like this.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_SpringFes21,Face|Being on the losing side would be
more embarrassing than this garb...
I'll be putting my all into this one!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ンン,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|Hm! What is THAT? Some colorful
fluff on a stick?$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|It seems to be a treat of some kind...
People look like they're enjoying it.
...Do you want to try some, Nah?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|No, I don— Er...actually, I DO want
to try it!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|Then allow me to buy some.$k$p$WmMPID_ンン,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you, Saleh... I just spent my
spare funds on that performance,
so I can't afford it myself...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|Never you mind. The Great Dragon
is enjoying herself, so consider this
an expression of my gratitude.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|You always notice things I miss,
Nah... I appreciate you being here.
It's fun!$k$p$nMPID_ンン|...R-really?$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|Is that a surprise?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|Well, I've always heard it's not
exactly normal for children to
be considerate of others...$k$pSo I thought it might be good for
me to try being selfish for once,
to act like the child I am.$k$pBut if I was making you happy,
maybe I was still just being
considerate after all.$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|I see... Well, you needn't force
yourself to change.$k$p$nMPID_ンン|I guess you're right... Plus all that
saying what I wanted was getting
exhausting. Heh...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|Ah. In that case, I shall return this
treat to the vendor.$k$p$WmMPID_ンン,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|N-no! I'm not THAT exhausted!
Hey! I wanted that, Saleh!$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|Teeheehee!$k$p$Sbs150|
